all-the-interaction-: «All the interaction with your bank at your fingertips»
all-three-inputs: All three inputs, account, card and limit, must be supplied.
amount-not-a-number: Amount is not a number. Must be a number!
confirm-cancel: Do you really want to cancel? Changes will be lost!
daily-greater-than-monthly-limit: Daily limit must not be greater than monthly limit!
daily-limit-range-violation: Daily limit must be in the range from {from} to {to}!
data-protection-text: We take your privacy seriously. Thus we do not collect any data at all. The password gets hashed and all data is encrypted before it is stored on the device.
if-you-are-new-p1: If you are new to this app, we have a
monthly-limit-range-violation: Monthly limit must be in the range from {from} to {to}!
order-qr-payment: To order a QR payment, please provide account and amount!
please-fill-in-the-form-: Please fill in the form to apply for a new card.
run-the-tour-: Run the Quick-Tour at any time later by selecting it from the menu.
swipe-through-the-tour-: Swipe through the Quick-Tour to get an overview of MX-Banklets' features.
take-the-tour-: Take the Quick-Tour to get an overview of MX-Banklets' features.
what-do-you-want-to-do: What would you like to do?
